alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Isle of Wight, and east central Southampton Counties and the central City of Suffolk through 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrsville, or near Windsor, moving east southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Holland, Suffolk, Kings Fork, Zuni, Carrsville, Lummis, Indika, Collosse, Kilby, Walters, Boaz, Burdette and Elwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
